line.comment: * First spawn an M3 temporary leader.
* Ease the selection of support ships (ie. passing fighters before carriers; don't really know why it's working).
* Add fighters if needed. -- We don't, see comment in Mayhem.Monitor.Autopopulate.Ship.

sval.val: First spawn an M3 temporary leader.
Ease the selection of support ships (ie. passing fighters before carriers; don't really know why it's working).
Add fighters if needed. -- We don't, see comment in Mayhem.Monitor.Autopopulate.Ship.
